articles.description: Pep Guardiola's Manchester City may have been knocked out, but his influence can still be felt in the Champions League semi-finals, says Guillem Balague.
articles.title: Champions League: How semi-final coaches were inspired by Pep Guardiola

articles.description: Mikel Arteta says Arsenal "want much more" in the Champions League before they take on Paris St-Germain in the semi-finals in "one of the biggest games the Emirates Stadium has seen".
articles.title: Arsenal v PSG: Mikel Arteta says Gunners 'want much more' before Champions League semi-final

articles.description: Rajasthan Royals' 14-year-old batter Vaibhav Suryavanshi makes history as the youngest player to score a century in men's T20s.
articles.title: IPL 2025: 14-year-old Vaibhav Suryavanshi becomes youngest player to score century in men's T20s

articles.description: Snooker's legendary 'Class of 92' - John Higgins, Mark Williams and Ronnie O'Sullivan - have won 14 world titles between them and are all in contention in 2025.
articles.title: 2025 World Snooker Championship: 'Class of 92' graduates aim for more Crucible glory

articles.description: Mohamed Salah's selfie celebration during Liverpool's Premier League title-clinching win over Tottenham has already become an iconic moment.
articles.title: Mohamed Salah selfie: The story of iconic Liverpool celebration

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at the big winners and losers from an eventful NFL Draft, headlined by Travis Hunter and Shedeur Sanders' contrasting fortunes.
articles.title: NFL Draft 2025 winners and losers including Shedeur Sanders and Travis Hunter

articles.description: Oleksandr Usyk says Daniel Dubois showed "weakness" by pushing him during their face-off as they promoted their rematch to become the undisputed world heavyweight champion at Wembley on 19 July.
articles.title: Oleksandr Usyk v Daniel Dubois: Ukrainian says Briton's push was a sign of 'weakness'

articles.description: A national power outage delays play at the Madrid Open, with Britain's Jacob Fearnley among those forced off court.
articles.title: Madrid Open: Spanish power outage stops play as Jacob Fearnley forced off court

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats as promoted Leeds United take on Bristol City in the Championship.
articles.title: Leeds United v Bristol City LIVE: Championship score & latest updates

articles.description: World number one Judd Trump holds off Shaun Murphy's fightback to move into the World Championship quarter-finals.
articles.title: World Snooker Championship: Judd Trump beats Shaun Murphy
